I just can't believe how much Blizzard has been squandering this IP, but the fact that this latest gaffe that resulted in people not getting the DLC they paid for is simply atrocious - this company can't even effectively utilize their lifelines.

Make your opinions known, everyone. Blizzard can't rely on plausible deniability anymore.

TRASH GAME TRASH COMPANY
G O.F K.U R S E L F. BOBBY  R.I.P.

PLEASE READ!!!!!!! DO NOT GIVE THEM YOUR MONEY!!!!!!!

So let me be honest here.. I do love this game. Its fun game.. it really is.. but its ruined by a HORRENDOUS company with brutal and questionable practices. 

First off THE REPORT SYSTEM!!!!!!!!!! (the biggest problem) 

This game is run by an auto mated report system. Which is heavily abused by players and trollers. You are better off not using comms at all.. because if you ask someone to swap heroes or heals you can get reported for " comm abuse" You can get reported over the pettiest things. If enough are on your account you are automatically flagged and banned. If blizzard sees that you use a single cuss word in the chat for whatever reason.. BOOM! You're done. First is a month long ban and after that is PERMANENT ACCOUNT CLOSURE. This happened to me.. I've been playing since Overwatch 1 and I have supported Overwatch up to this point. After that I appealed it several times and nothing.  They DO NOT care and you WILL NOT get your account back nor a refund for any amount of money you have spent into the game... All of the money I spent, all of my skins, golden guns, rares etc. Gone. Instead of implementing a report system that makes sense.. such as getting penalized with a temporary muted like Dota 2 does.. or something of the sorts.. Blizzard thinks its fair to give you the finger and close your account completely. 

So DO NOT give them ANY MONEY whatsoever!!! Do not support this company nor their insane penalties!!!


Secondly the whole game is structured with a GREEDY MARKET!

The $10 Battlepass is the only thing I agree with here and it is loaded with a fair amount of content. Its a free to play game and I get it.. the Devs need money. Everything else in the shop is just overpriced.. So about the recent battle pass.They cut the single player PVE content and throw it in this update but GUESS WHAT? You have to PAY FOR IT TO PLAY IT. I am completely confused as to why the Invasion missions arent included in the $10 battle pass along with the current skins? Wouldn't that encourage MORE people to buy the battle pass and play the game for BP progression? Im so confused why they think its worth an extra $15 just to play 3 Levels. I have seen the levels online and they are Mid at best. Its pretty much the same as Retribution missions but with a flare. 


UNBALANCES IN GAME
So for whatever reason the Devs do not just introduce new heroes and give them to you as they are release.. they are behind the battle pass or a LONG GRINDING "CHALLENGES" mission you have to activate. This is the dumbest thing Ive ever seen.. Especially with new heroes a they are introduced. When Kiriko first game out she was the only character who can counter Ana and Junk Queens anti grenade.. but you had to have the battle pass to do the hero challenge just to play. So you are at a disadvantage until you unlock the hero because you cannot counter pick.. This is especially a problem in Ranked games. If you need to play ranked and pick the counter you are out of luck. Its stupid. 

Like I said.. its a fine game and its fun. It has ALOT of potential.. but DO NOT give these people any of your money nor your time until they make some serious changes. I doubt they are going to change but only time will tell.

An absolutely abhorrent gutting of what was once an incredible game. Lying about the main attraction of the game to get people invested and spend money to later announce it's not happening, charging obscene amounts for skins that were even once the cheapest skins on original OW, the vile battlepass model that does nor adds anything interesting to the game, and a mountain of other problems.

They entirely hollowed out this game for the sake of a disgusting cash grab and it's one of the saddest things i've ever seen. It should have been obvious they were taking this turn when they removed "no duplicates in loot boxes" from the original in hopes of getting more money, but nothing could have prepared anyone for just how utterly garbage this would become.

烂 不是没道理的烂

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

没想到到了2023年终于有一个我能理直气壮写测评的游戏了(●ˇ∀ˇ●)
恭喜守望先锋上架steam！
让我想想，该从哪里说起？
从《双龙》？
从“年度最佳游戏”？
从上海龙42连败到冠军？
从济南屁王？
从PVE？
算了，
让我来说一说，阿育陀耶的落日。
阿育陀耶的正中间有一个莲花池，从左边沿着楼梯上去，半透明的白色纱帘飞舞，纱帘后是遥远的群山，和隐匿于群山之后，只留下光芒的太阳。
有时候我会在阿育陀耶的悬崖边坐一晚上，看着夕阳。
或许这不是落日，而是日出？不管如何我是武断地认为这是落日了。
小王子说他最难过的时候看了43次落日。
我的落日呢？
它永远挂在天上，却也永远看不见形状，这样永恒的落日，又是否代表了永恒的泪水呢？
我从暮色四合等到晨曦初露，也没有等到我想要的答案。

2016年的暑假，闷热昏暗的客厅，我悄悄地偷出我爸的笔记本下载了OW，进了游戏后，人物模型模糊的好像我400度的眼镜没带一样，但我居然玩下去了。
在阿努比斯神殿B点正中的三个小门，我拿着Dva和堡垒站在一起，试图将B点大门的敌人打死。
在花村的A点，我拿着小美，狂按左键，试图冻住在钟旁跟我二人转的对手。
我一开始是不屑于玩辅助的，初三的时候总觉得自己会是世界第一DPS，结果错过了天使群拉==
2019年，大家从高中毕业，各奔东西。我终于有了一些可以支配的资金，毫不犹豫地买了OW豪华版，并且开始四处寻找队友。嘿，还真给我找到了。自此我们的玩具车成立。同年OW2的cg让我对这个游戏充满了希望。
2020年，我开始看pva的直播，经常看到半夜，翻来覆去地看云水遥遥写的短篇，为了狙击pva苦练技术但最终也只上了个钻石。
2021年凌晨，我们车队所有人都换了金刀，在游戏里六个金刀源氏一起合影过元旦。
2022年10月2日，天使陪着我在阿育陀耶看着落日，迎来了OW1的谢幕。
2023年1月24日，国服的一切终止在斗兽场的大白旁。

现在已经是2023年8月11日了，是没有PVE的OW2，是全面溃烂的济南屁王，是没有金刀的源氏，是上不去的排位分，没有等级边框的外服，梦一样消散的国服。我也不再在阿育陀耶看落日。

7年，很遥远吗？
7年，是86个月，是2634天，是63240个小时。
7年，却也只是419个字符。
7年过去了，守望先锋的世界一片混乱，我的世界也没有变得更好。
不论如何我确实无法割舍与守望先锋之间的感情了，它参与了我这几年的每一个日夜，一个逐渐变成无聊的大人的人和一个逐渐落寞的游戏，是非常契合的。
守望先锋还是我最喜欢的游戏，但我确实也不再如以前那样喜欢守望先锋。
有时候我打开它，却停留在主页发呆。
什么时候能看到阿育陀耶的日出呢？
会者定离，
一期一祈。
好了，该睡了。
